name: Legend of Sword
description:
Game introduction

    In this world of cultivating immortals, in order to become an unfettered immortal, free from the constraints of the world, you embark on the path of cultivating immortals and practice all the way, just to become a unique immortal. The story begins with the protagonist entering ancient ruins to seek opportunities to improve his cultivation.On the way to immortality, if you meet a destined person, you can also become an immortal couple and raise your own next generation!

Featured system

  • Xianyuan System
    Players can form partners with players of the opposite sex and raise their own next generation.
  • Level system
    There are hundreds of levels in the game waiting for players to conquer. While killing the level BOSS, you can obtain a large number of equipment to improve your personal abilities. And as the level progresses, you can also obtain a large number of summoning talismans.
  • BOSS system
    Players can obtain powerful weapons and equipment by killing various BOSSs. Depending on the difficulty, there are single-player BOSS, multi-player BOSS, cross-server BOSS, Shura underground palace BOSS, etc. The greater the difficulty, the more powerful equipment can be obtained.
  • Mount system
    The mount not only has a beautiful appearance, but also has powerful skills to assist players.
  • Spirit pet system
    Spiritual pets have cute looks and can also inspire powerful skills to assist players.
  • God General System
    On the way to immortality, hundreds of immortals can be recovered by players and become their strongest assistants in the process of cultivating immortality.
  • Lingjiang System
    After the player obtains the Phantom God and the energy bar is full, he can transform into the Phantom God within the duration. The Phantom God has powerful combat power.
  • Zongmen system
    After joining the sect, you can receive a lot of benefits and participate in the special gameplay that belongs to the sect.

Featured gameplay

  • Wildland gameplay
    Players can challenge players to get rewards in the cloud game, or have a chance to trigger special events, and complete special events to get special rewards.
  • Xiaoyaoyou
    Various magical events will be triggered randomly, you may obtain treasures, you may be attacked by monsters, or you may be attacked by ancient monsters.
  • Trial of the Immortals
    By passing the tests of gods of different strengths, you can obtain various rewards.
  • Travel gameplay
    Earn points by defeating other players, and finally receive rewards based on your points ranking.
  • How to play the Tao
    It is divided into multiple levels. At the weekly settlement, the higher the level, the more rewards you can receive.
  • Fairy and Demon Showdown
    Form a team of 3 people and compete with players from other servers.
  • Plane travel
    You can travel to other planes. After defeating the masters on this interface, you have a chance to obtain powerful skill books, rare partner fragments, precious mount fragments, etc.
  • Attack the Fairyland
    Once you have strong strength, you can lead your partners to attack various fairy realms. After killing the guarding BOSS, you can obtain very precious equipment.

Advanced gameplay

  • Spiritual world
    It will only be opened after reaching a certain level of cultivation. There is an extremely powerful BOSS here, and you can get a lot of rewards after killing it. But be careful as you may be attacked by other players
  • Kunlun
    It includes multiple gameplay methods, including competition for immortals, competition for hegemony in the fairy world, competition for territory, fierce battles among sects, team competitions, etc.
